```{r}
#load data 
data<- read_csv("dws_clean.csv")
head(data)

ggplot(data, aes(x=ass_blame, y=vict_blame)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm")

data<- data %>% 
  mutate(vict_blamer=round(vict_blame, 2))

table(data$vict_blamer)
```
